===========
wspr-varint
===========

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/wspr_varint.svg

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/ArkadiuszMichalRys/wspr_varint.svg

A variable length integer implementation for the wspr project.
